TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Uh, what would work, "Laythe\_", "\_Laythe" or "Laythe "
> (I presume that "Laythe " is the one that you preferred, but you can never be too sure)

Laythe with a space! (It kinda rhymes)

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Laytheception? \*X-files and Inception theme play at same time\*

Layyyytheeeeeee

Could I have my name changed to JetJaguar, if it's available? I just discovered that there's somebody else posting KSP videos on YouTube using the name "Hot Jupiter", and I don't want to cause confusion.

> 
> Could I have my name changed to JetJaguar, if it's available? I just discovered that there's somebody else posting KSP videos on YouTube using the name "Hot Jupiter", and I don't want to cause confusion.

Done.

> 
> Done.

Thanks!

> 
> Yes.
> We will only do it once per person, though.

Could you change mine to MSOSDev?

> 
> To show the true and utter lonliness of the planet Dres, I would like to have my name changed to:
> Dres
> 
> Yes, I have checked. Yes, it is not taken. WOOOOOO! And I'm totally serious. I like Dres, it's cool.
> 
> For anyone who is interested, so far I have found that Gilly and Tylo are also open. I wonder how long those are going to last now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> (Unless there are somehow invisible shadow people named that, in which case I will be severely dissapointed and slightly alarmed.)

Oops, didn't see you there at the bottom of the page like that.

Name changed, even if it is a bit late.
there is already a name change thread, look in the stickies at the top of this forum

Aye, as we now have [an official name change request thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122939-The-Name-Change-Thread-%28WARNING%21-ONE-TIME-ONLY%21%29), this one appears to have outlived its purpose. Closing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Can my name be changed to "Laythe " (with a space)

>

Thanks!

> 
> Can my name be changed to "Laythe " (with a space)

Sorry Laythe Dweller, the space would not be visible so you'd effectively be impersonating an existing member, you'll have to think of something else.
But what if he's no longer active, and never was active? I'll think of a new name though.
Some people got really mad when their accounts were deleted due to the April rollback. It would be even worse if we did something like that deliberately.

I have a similar issue with Laythe Dweller. 'Minmus' kind of became my nickname, but I can't change it because there's already someone called Minmus. At least it's better than Laythe, though -- Minmus' last activity was at March 2014 and made 5 posts.

Ah well, I can still live with my current username.
